message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.DS, cs.CE 

The paper discusses the use of machine learning models for airline pricing and introduces an adaptive meta-decision framework that uses Thompson sampling, a popular multi-armed bandit solution method. This work involves machine learning, artificial intelligence, and optimization techniques, which are commonly associated with the following arXiv CS sub-categories: 

- cs.LG (Machine Learning)
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence)
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval)
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms)
- cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science)
